body.name: KOITAT Handheld Steam Cleaner, Steam Cleaner for Home with 10 Accessory Kit, Multipurpose Portable Upholstery Steamer Cleaning with Safety Lock to Remove Grime, Grease, and More, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 mins
features: 🌱Powerful Hot Steam: KOITAT Handheld Steam Cleaner heats to produce 221°F (105°C) high temperature steam to clean oil, dust and stains. Make your home as good as new.

🌱Natural & Safe: Steam cleaner for home 100% Natural with no harmful fumes or residue. Includes a safety lock on the handle and a safety cap for added peace of mind for your safety. It can be used with confidence around children and pets.

🌱Save Time and Effort: Steamer for cleaning only needs to heat water to work, without complicated tools and tedious operations. It doesn't even need to be cleaned multiple times, so it's easy to get the cleaning done and gives you more free time.

🌱10-piece Accessory Set: KOITAT portable steam cleaner does an amazing job of cleaning and ironing. Plus 10-piece accessory kit such as: angled nozzle, bendable extension, nozzle with brush, fabric steamer tool, rubber wiper for window/door, and many other extras. It’s all-purpose and can go and clean out any hard to reach gaps, corners, angles, and also various surfaces/materials: kitchen sink, BBQ grill, toilet, shower curtains, floor, kids’ toy, pet mattress, car, sofa, and clothing.

🌱Powerful Boiler: Steamer cleaning heats up quickly in 3 minutes and emits 221°F pressurized powerful hot steam. 1050W power, 350ML water tank capacity (250ML water capacity is recommended to leave some space for normal use), continuous running time of 10 minutes or more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KOITAT portable steam cleaner only needs to heat water to work, without complicated tools and tedious operations. It doesn't even need to be cleaned multiple times, so it's easy to get the cleaning done and gives you more free time.

Bent nozzle+Extended spray Easy cleaning of toilets, lavatories, etc. Window / Door cleaning tool Steam cleans and squeegees flat surfaces like windows, glass and mirrors. Ironing towel+Ironing brush Clean and remove fabric folds, such as clothes, curtains and sofas.
Extended connecting spray Increased stretch to clean hard-to-reach areas. Round brush Cleans grease, dust and stains from the kitchen. Long spray nozzle Clean oil, dirt and sludge from cars.

Principle of operation When the oil or dirty thing meet high temperature, it will easy drop from the surface. So do not let the nozzle or accessories leave target too far. The steam will become cold and can not clean well. Pleasc let the nozzle close for 5-10mm from the target that you want to clean.

Why can't I open the lid after use? Steam Cleaner with steam and high temperature inside the safety cap can not be opened to protect against accidents. Correct steps to open the cap: 1, Unplug the power outlet. 2, Push the steam gun switch and empty the steam. 3, After the red dot sinks, open the cap. 4, Wait 2-3 minutes before adding water or clearing the remaining water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this KOITAT handheld cleaner. It has a powerful hot steam that helped me clean the oil splashes, dust and stains on my oven and fridge. My kitchen looks brand new again. I have a young toddler so I want to make sure all surfaces are clean and free for her. Especially the fact that this cleaner comes with a safety lock on the handle and a safety cap for my child's safety is a bonus. The steamer is so easy to use and so quick to heat up. It heats up in 3 minutes and emits 221°F pressurized powerful hot steam! I can't wait to clean the rest of my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Steam Cleaner
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm impressed with the KOITAT Handheld Steam Cleaner! From the well-packaged arrival to the clear instructions, it was a breeze to get started. I put it to the test on two tough jobs: my shower and my oven door (using separate cleaning heads, of course!). In both cases, the KOITAT delivered!As you can see in my attached video, the steam output is strong and continuous, making quick work of grime and grease. My shower tiles are sparkling again, and the oven door looks brand new – no harsh chemicals needed!Overall, I'm highly satisfied with the KOITAT. It's powerful, easy to use, and tackles a wide range of cleaning tasks. If you're looking for a versatile and effective steam cleaner, I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love our steam cleaner. We love that it is smaller yet it still does an incredible job cleaning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super handy product
reviews.reviewText: Ordered for my girlfriend for Christmas, and now she won’t stop cleaning. She loves it. The small size makes it super easy to clean hard to reach spots, and the tool is very diverse in that it allows you to clean so many different things around the house, as well as in our vehicles. Very much worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Effective But Tiring
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Just got this steam cleaner today and used it on our very dirty oven first. It makes it SO much easier to get hard dried on stains off so that you don’t have to scrape and scrub for a long time. I used the hose attachment and the scrubbing head in the video. It is fairly loud when operating.While it was very effective and satisfying to see how easily the steam washes off hard dried on stains, it was very tiring! You have to hold the steam cleaner with one hand and push the button up and knob down with your thumb. After a while, this is very uncomfortable for your thumb. I think this is a child safety feature, but I would be so much happier with it if I could just switch it on without having to hold down the button the whole time. Still, I would purchase it again because it was so powerful at removing stains! I used it to quickly clean and wipe off the kitchen mats too, and it was perfect for this too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Junk - Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: I got this steamer for my wife for Christmas. We filled it up for water, cleaned some baby toys and then could not get the cap back off. It seems like the plastic cap is stripped from the metal fitting. Also, the tool attachements are cheap and 1 broke the only time we used it. I would spend more money and buy a better quality steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and does an amazing job.
reviews.reviewText: I wish I took before and after photos to post. This little steam cleaner is easy to use and really did a number on my windows and patio door. I was flabbergasted at the amount of stuff that came out of my windows, and as someone who cleans a lot I was impressed. I’ve been using it all over my apartment since I got it, next up is grout and carpets. So far I’ve used it on windows, baseboards, air conditioner, shower, faucets and they’ve all come out fantastic. I definitely wish I bought one of these sooner.Also to be noted, I usually do a quick clean everyday and then on weekends do a deep clean. Adding this to your weekly deep clean is sure to give your home that fresh and clean “new” feeling. Because everything I’ve cleaned with it so far has looked like the day I moved in by the time I was done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works on everything! Even your fridge.
reviews.reviewText: I originally got this to steam clean my couch and bed but then I ended up steam cleaning everything I own. This thing is awesome! I do prefer using it on hard surfaces because you will need some sort of wet vac to dry up the steam if using it on your couch or bed, but ohhhh boy does it do a great job cleaning!

reviews.reviewTitle: it’s great! a well made, safe, and practical steam cleaner.
reviews.reviewText: great value seems like it’ll last for a long time!it’s simple to fill using the funnel and cup, heats quickly and is not heavy to make using it very easy and practical. it comes with a lot of attachments that are easy to add or remove, but i’ve only really needed to use one or two. without an attachment on the head it’s fast / high pressure so can be surprising when you first use it!to turn on once it’s filled and the red light has turned on and then off again, you have to push-slide the on button up and then push down again to start the steam. i’ve used it for cleaning on all kinds of surfaces, it really easily loosens grime and it’s great otherwise to have the peace of mind that i’m killing bacteria regularly by incorporating steaming into my cleaning routine. another reason i had in buying this was to be able to steam clean things like my couch / pillows, or delicate fabrics that can’t be machine washed, like a really old archival silk robe i have — and it worked so well! no damage to my clothing.re: the small water reservoir / safety cap wait time — only sort of annoyance but just because you have to wait to open it and refill it or you’ll 100% burn yourself. makes sense. just have to unplug and wait until the red safety heat / pressure plunger drops back inside the cap, and then push down and twist, while still being cautious to open it. it’s a bit of a tedious refill process but ultimately doesn’t bother me at all, it is a practical size and feels very safe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very affordable and super easy to use the hand held steamer. Great for reaching tough areas to clean with the attachments provided. Removes the rough grime and stains with the powerful jet of steam. 100% recommend for home use.

reviews.reviewTitle: 頑固な汚れも落とせます
reviews.reviewText: 職場の調理場で使用しています。頑固な油汚れもこれで汚れを浮かして拭き取れば簡単に落ちます。価格もお手ごろです。買って良かったと思いました！

reviews.reviewTitle: A Must-Have Steamer for Wrinkle-Free Fabrics and Beyond!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm beyond impressed with the handheld Steamer! It's a compact powerhouse, the sleek design and lightweight build add to the overall convenience.The steamer's performance is stellar—it swiftly glides over fabrics, leaving them looking professionally pressed with a powerful steam output. The generous water reservoir and quick heat-up time make it efficient, while the automatic shut-off ensures safety.What truly sets this steamer apart is its versatility. It's not just for clothes; I've successfully used it to refresh upholstery, and curtains, and even remove wrinkles from bed linens. It's become an all-in-one solution for maintaining a polished look throughout my home.A bonus surprise—this steamer excels at cleaning tasks! From freshening up couches to tackling grime in ovens and bathrooms, its versatility has exceeded my expectations. It's truly a must-have for anyone seeking efficiency and convenience in their daily routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Nice steamer, heats up quickly, easy to use, lovely results
reviews.reviewText: Got this product for getting into those hard to get places and jetting away engrained dirt from grouting and int he hard to clean corners of the kitchen and for cleaning the ovenI was really pleased to find that the steamer is really straight forward to use and comes with loads of different attachments making it really versatile. Its heats up really quickly (within a few minutes) making it useful in no time at all. If I could criticise one thing, and that is that the water tank isn't transparent so you cant tell how much steaming time you have left. Typically not a big issue (especially given the price) but would make a positive different if the design were changed in future. If it wasn't for this, it would have got a straight 5 stars. Nice product.
